transcript_en:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Good morning sir, good afternoon sir.
Customer: Good afternoon.
Executive: Hello. This is Komal Prasad Pandey from IndiaMART, sir.
Customer: Yes, tell me.
Executive: Yes sir. As you were saying, okay. I will talk to my team about this, okay. Whatever the resolution will be, I will update you, okay. And if there are any other service-related issues, please tell me, sir. I am here to resolve them, sir.
Customer: What improvements can we make in the service, like regarding BuyLeads, etc.? Please tell me.
Customer: There is also a problem with leads, I don't get the leads I want.
Executive: Ah, for which product do you want BuyLeads, sir?
Customer: Hmm hmm. Tell me, for which product do you need more BuyLeads?
Customer: One minute, your voice is breaking. One minute, hold on.
Executive: Yes, yes, okay.
Customer: The product, our product, turmeric?
Executive: Yes, yes, I am checking, sir. Yes, yes, I am listening, sir.
Customer: I am not getting the leads in bulk for that.
Executive: Sir, right now I am.
Customer: They come.
Executive: Yes, I am checking, sir. Sir, my request.
Customer: I am telling you about bulk. Just 35 minutes ago, one came from Bangalore, Karnataka, okay. Turmeric finger double polish, okay. This is a BuyLead for 30 tons, the order value is 10 lakhs to 20 lakhs, okay. You click on contact buyer now.
Customer: It's not coming. You wrote it, but I don't get such leads every day, sometimes I get one or two.
Executive: Sir, as far as I can see, all the BuyLeads are related to turmeric, and I don't see any BuyLeads below 5 lakhs or 10 lakhs. You can see it yourself on the portal. Just open the portal.
Customer: I am talking about quantity, I am talking about tonnage. Because 5 kg, 2 kg, 1 kg, I don't deal in that.
Executive: No, no, I don't see any for 1 kg, 2 kg right now. As of now, I am checking, sir. I don't see any for 1 kg, 2 kg. Still, whenever you have such issues, there is a bulk filter, okay. Apply the bulk filter there, click on contact buyer now, okay. You will see the BuyLead, okay. Sorry, apply the bulk filter there, you will see the product you want in bulk. And the BuyLead with the highest quantity will be displayed first when you apply the bulk filter. And there is also an option for order value, okay. Above 1 lakh, 50,000, 10,000, okay.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hmm. These are also given, so you can do that, okay. I see that many BuyLeads are being missed, you are not even consuming them. As I am seeing your activity, you have been active for almost 19 days in the last month. And the
Customer: Buyer's calls also come.
Executive: Buyer's.
Customer: Yes. We accept the buyer's calls, but the payment issue is not being sorted out, that's why I am consuming fewer leads.
Executive: Sir, our team is working on that, I am telling you, our team is working on that. You should also do whatever you can from your side, okay. So that we both can support each other and work on it together. As far as I am getting updates from the client, I have seen that a mail has also been sent to them, okay. Our Nidhi mam was there, who was looking after it, one second, wait, Nidhi was the one who was looking after it.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Who was from our buyer's team, okay. She was coordinating with you properly, okay. She did everything she could.
Customer: Did she send a notice stating seven days, but the buyer has not responded to it yet.
Executive: Yes, sir, that is the buyer's.
Customer: With you.
Executive: No, I don't have anything like that.
Customer: Have you received any response? I haven't received any response, that's why I am asking if I should send another notice or something. Whatever it is.
Executive: I will personally talk to Nidhi ji about that.
Customer: I also sent a reminder mail and a request, but Nidhi has not replied to it yet, and nothing is happening.
Executive: Yes.
Customer: And I also wrote directly to our advocate. I kept them in CC. No one is replying to it.
Executive: Okay. Okay. They should reply to the mail at least.
Executive: Okay, I will talk to them, I will talk to them about this, what are the things, they will connect you, okay. Whatever it is, yes. And sir, this ticket has been raised on me, so I can close it, the one you did 9696.
Customer: Yes, you can close it, I don't have any problem with that. Please set up the leads a little bit, I want something like that.
Executive: Yes, I will, okay, leads will come, I have also shown you the leads, you can consume them if you want, okay. If there are any issues related to BuyLeads, please call me immediately, I will be with you 24 hours from 9 am to 6 pm, whatever issues come, I will resolve them, whatever service-related things are there, okay. Please tell the legal team a little bit.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Yes, I will tell them, okay. And it will go for our feedback, I am closing it, it will go for feedback, if I have given you a good suggestion, then please do that, okay sir.
Customer: Okay, okay, yes. Hmm hmm hmm okay, yes, yes, thank you.
Executive: Okay. Okay, is there any other concern sir, besides these two things? Okay. No, no, no. Okay, I will request you not to miss the buyer's calls, keep the BuyLeads active as much as possible, okay. There are some products in which you are dealing, one second, wait, I will tell you.
Executive: Stay on the line.
Executive: Like turmeric powder, sir. You haven't added this product, should I add this product, turmeric powder, do you deal in this, sir?
Customer: Yes, we do, add it.
Executive: Turmeric powder is added in one place, but single polish Salem turmeric Gonda turmeric powder. Gonda, is Gonda a brand, sir?
Customer: It is in turmeric, it comes as gattu.
Executive: Yes? Does it come from Gonda, Gonda?
Customer: No, no, it is there, one.
Executive: Okay, okay, okay. Turmeric, the same gatta comes.
Executive: Yes, okay, I will correct it once, turmeric single polish, right, turmeric powders. There are also turmeric products, what all comes in turmeric products, like you have added single polish Salem turmeric Gonda turmeric powder, all these things come in it, okay. No problem, I will check it once and add the product, okay, if you have images, please give them to me, okay. I will add all the things in it, yes. What will be the price of the turmeric product?
Customer: Yes sir? 165 165 kg.
Executive: 165 per kg, right?
Customer: Yes, yes, per kg.
Executive: One second and I will ask in this. Turmeric.
Executive: I am adding any product in this, okay. I mean, the turmeric you have added, okay, once you see the product we have, I can add it. In powder and standing, can we add it, sir, right? Okay. See which variety comes in this, Salem comes, Rajapuri comes, lockdown comes or Wigon comes, which one comes, black kali Amba white turmeric Kocha or any other, which one sir?
Customer: Rajapuri comes one.
Executive: Rajapuri Rajapuri Salem Rajapuri Salem. Yes, in which form is it, in finger, in slice, in powder, in which is it in all?
Customer: In all three, in all three, in all.
Executive: Sir, in all three. Absolutely label.
Executive: Okay. I will talk to my team about this, okay. So that your response is given as soon as possible, okay sir. This will be in turmeric finger, I am doing it, okay. Sir, is it also ayurvedic ingredient herbs? In turmeric powder.
Customer: Ah, we give in powder, in which form do we give it?
Executive: Yes, I have done it in powder, its category etc. is nice, okay. Now whatever things are there, you can discuss, you can deal in a lot of good jaggery, sir, what will be the price of good jaggery?
Customer: The price of good jaggery is 50 rupees kg.
Executive: 50 kg.
Customer: Kg hmm.
Executive: 50 where will I get its photos image sir?
Customer: I don't have the image. I don't have the image of jaggery sir. You just add it and do it, I will put the image in it tomorrow.
Executive: Okay sir no problem, okay okay. Okay sir no problem, I am doing all these things. See a little bit of keyword etc. update it a little bit if there is something.
Executive: Okay I have worked on the keyword in it, okay sir. No problem in this, I will do as much as possible. Okay sir and whatever things are there tell me, okay sir. Okay okay. Hmm hmm hmm okay yes yes thank you.
Executive: Okay sir.

issues.problem: Customer is not receiving enough BuyLeads for turmeric in bulk quantities (tonnage).
issues.actionable_summary: Investigate the lead delivery settings and ensure the customer is receiving relevant bulk inquiries. Verify that the customer's filters are correctly configured to prioritize tonnage.

issues.problem: Customer is receiving leads for smaller quantities (5kg, 2kg, 1kg) which are not relevant to their business.
issues.actionable_summary: Review the lead filtering mechanism to ensure accurate targeting based on quantity. Implement stricter quality control measures to prevent irrelevant leads from being delivered.

issues.problem: Unresolved payment issue is hindering the customer's lead consumption.
issues.actionable_summary: Escalate the payment issue to the relevant team for immediate resolution. Provide the customer with a clear timeline and regular updates on the progress.

issues.problem: Customer is awaiting a response from the legal team regarding a buyer dispute and has not received any communication despite sending reminders.
issues.actionable_summary: Escalate the legal issue to the legal team and ensure they prioritize the customer's case. Provide the customer with a direct point of contact within the legal team and a clear timeline for resolution.

issues.problem: Customer mentions not receiving a response from Nidhi despite sending reminder mails and requests.
issues.actionable_summary: Investigate the lack of response from Nidhi and ensure proper communication protocols are followed. Implement a system for tracking and responding to customer inquiries in a timely manner.

issues.problem: Customer wants leads to be set up correctly.
issues.actionable_summary: Review the customer's lead management settings and provide personalized training on how to effectively use the platform to manage and consume leads.

issues.problem: Customer needs turmeric powder and jaggery added to their catalog.
issues.actionable_summary: Ensure the turmeric powder and jaggery products are added to the customer's catalog with accurate details and relevant keywords. Follow up with the customer to obtain images for the products.

churn.churn_reason: Unresolved payment issue, lack of bulk leads, and poor communication from legal team.

upsell.upsell_reason: Customer is focused on resolving existing issues and may not be receptive to upsell offers at this time.

call_summary: The customer is facing issues with the quality and quantity of BuyLeads for turmeric, specifically wanting bulk orders. He also has an unresolved payment issue and is awaiting a response from the legal team regarding a buyer dispute. The agent attempts to troubleshoot the lead issues and offers to add turmeric powder and jaggery to the catalog.

key_insights: The customer is facing multiple issues, including lead quality, payment problems, and lack of communication from the legal team.
The agent attempted to address the lead quality issue and offered to add products to the catalog, but failed to address the payment and legal issues effectively.
llm_raw_response.original_summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs more buyleads in turmeric.

- Payment issues not sorted out.

- No response from Nidhi regarding payment issue.

- Wants leads in tonnage, not in bulk.



Resolution:

- Executive assured resolution and update.

- Executive explained bulk filter and order value options.

- Executive confirmed team working on payment issues.

- Executive to personally follow up with Nidhi.

- Executive added turmeric powder product to catalog.

- Executive to add product and price for jaggery.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect with customer regarding issues.

- Executive will add product details to catalog.

- Executive will follow up with legal team.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, turmeric, payment, catalog, jaggery
